title: Little Mix confirmed for new BBC talent show The Search to find next big band
text:

Little Mix are on The Search, appropriately titled, for the next big band and have joined forces with BBC One for a new talent show.

In 2020 the girl band, who shot to stardom on The X Factor as they were crowned champions in 2011, will be looking for singers to form different groups.

They can be boy bands, girl bands and mixed bands, who will all compete for the show's impressive prize.

Each band will be formed of solo singers, like the girls were on the ITV series before they went on to become one of the most successful British groups of all time.

Whoever wins the show, made by ModestTV, will even get to perform with the girls - made up of Perrie Edwards, Jesy Nelson, Jade Thirlwall and Leigh-Anne Pinnock - during their 2020 summer tour.

(Image: BBC)

The girls are hoping to create a new wave of music with several different bands, who will live together once they've been put together.

Not only that, but they'll have access to some of the people that helped the girls along the way to success.

They'll have access to the band's inner circle including their vocal coaches, song writers, producers and stylists, giving them the full insight to life as a band.

(Image: ITV)

The show will launch on BBC One and iPlayer in 2020, while exact details have yet to be confirmed - while applications appear to be open on the BBC website.

Speaking about the show, Little mix confirmed: "We want to create lots of incredible groups who really gel.

"As we have been there and done it ourselves, we know what it takes to make a group successful, and will be there to mentor them every step of the way.

(Image: Instagram)

"We want solo artists to audition as well as groups and every type of genre is welcome too.

"It's going to be really exciting and people can apply right now!"

Director of BBC Content Charlotte Moore said: “One of Britain’s most popular all-female bands Little Mix will bring their magic to BBC One on Saturday nights in 2020 in a brand new show set to inspire the next generation of young artists.”

Little Mix The Search will launch on the BBC in 2020.
description: Little Mix girls Perrie Edwards, Jesy Nelson, Jade Thirlwall and Leigh-Anne Pinnock will join forces with the BBC to find new bands
